description:
Introduction to Alibaba and Outsourcing Guide

Demystifying the Alibaba phenomenon

Everything you need to know about the biggest online e-commerce company in the world, and how YOU can become a part of this phenomenon to create enormous WEALTH!

COURSE DESCRIPTION

Alibaba -- considered the Holy Grail for outsourcing manufacturing -- is China's largest retailer. The company has been dominating headlines recently with its record-breaking initial public offering (IPO) in US History. Yes, larger than FACEBOOK, TWITTER, GOOGLE, ZYNGA , LINKEDIN and EBAY Combined!

In this course we teach you everything from A to Z about this e-commerce company and its affiliates; outsourcing and how to import from China; to use and navigate through its website; to communicate and negotiate with suppliers and manufacturers and build trustworthy relationships. We also cover AliExpress, a subsidiary of Alibaba -- and most importantly how you can make MONEY -- and lots of it -- with this e-commerce giant!

We've adapted an easy-to-learn direct approach that provides you with all the necessary tools you need to find top-notch manufacturers for virtually anything you need or want to produce. Our approach is streamlined to help you save countless hours researching and sorting through thousands of suppliers in order to find to find the reputable ones and recognizing and avoiding the scam artists.

We'll take a deep dive into the outsourcing industry and explore the pros and cons of importing from learning the lingo to covering duties, custom fees and tariffs!

At the end of this course you will have the tools needed and a thorough understanding of the import/export business and how to build a successful business from scratch with Alibaba!

We will also include valuable tips on how to build and market your business all in your spare time!



Ready…Set…LET'S GO!!
title: Alibaba and Outsourcing Guide
